Warren Buffett has a trick for getting his money's worth out of the stock market, and he says it's a skill "you can learn in the fourth grade" even though it's "not taught in schools."
At Berkshire … [+2690 chars]

articles.author: Mark Thompson
articles.title: BP profit more than doubles on 'exceptional' oil trading - CNN
articles.description: BP took a hit of more than $24 billion from ditching its business in Russia but reported a huge jump in profit for the first quarter.
articles.content:
BP took a hit of more than $24 billion from ditching its business in Russia but reported a huge jump in profit for the first quarter.
